title.narrative: DESCENTRALIZED, EQUITABLE EDUCATION POLI

description.narrative: By 2016, national, regional and local governments have improved capacities to implement descentralized, equitable education policies, which contributes to Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2016, children and adolescents, especially those living in prioritized Amazon, Andean regions and marginalized urban areas, have increased access to quality education improve their level of learning achievements
